mapper.select: select jbonsa_code as jbonsa_code from JCODE3 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE isnull(jpb_gubn,'') Like concat('%',#{jpb_gubn},'%') and jsayong_gubn <> '4' AND LEN(jbonsa_code) > 0 Group by jbonsa_code, jbonsa_code_seq ORDER BY CONVERT(int, jbonsa_code_seq)

select jbonsa_code as jbonsa_code from JCODE3 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE isnull(jpb_gubn,'') Like concat('%',#{jpb_gubn},'%') and jsayong_gubn <> '4' and jsayong_gubn in ('1', '2', '3') AND LEN(jbonsa_code) > 0 Group by jbonsa_code, jbonsa_code_seq ORDER BY CONVERT(int, jbonsa_code_seq)

select jbonsa_code as jbonsa_code from JCODE3 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE isnull(jpb_gubn,'') Like concat('%',#{jpb_gubn},'%') and jsayong_gubn <> '4' and jsayong_gubn in ('1') AND LEN(jbonsa_code) > 0 Group by jbonsa_code, jbonsa_code_seq ORDER BY CONVERT(int, jbonsa_code_seq)

select jbonsa_code as jbonsa_code from JCODE3 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE isnull(jpb_gubn,'') Like concat('%',#{jpb_gubn},'%') and jsayong_gubn <> '4' and jsayong_gubn in ('1', '2') AND LEN(jbonsa_code) > 0 Group by jbonsa_code, jbonsa_code_seq ORDER BY CONVERT(int, jbonsa_code_seq)

select jcustomer_code as jcustomer_code from JCODE3 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE isnull(jcustomer_code,'') NOT IN ('X') AND isnull(jpb_gubn,'') Like concat('%',#{jpb_gubn},'%') and jsayong_gubn <> '4' AND LEN(jcustomer_code) > 0 Group by jcustomer_code, jcustomer_code_seq, jpb_gubn ORDER BY CONVERT(int, jcustomer_code_seq)

select jcustomer_code as jcustomer_code from JCODE3 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE isnull(jcustomer_code,'') NOT IN ('X') AND isnull(jpb_gubn,'') Like concat('%',#{jpb_gubn},'%') and jsayong_gubn <> '4' and jsayong_gubn in ('1') AND LEN(jcustomer_code) > 0 Group by jcustomer_code, jcustomer_code_seq, jpb_gubn ORDER BY CONVERT(int, jcustomer_code_seq)

select jcustomer_code as jcustomer_code from JCODE3 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE isnull(jcustomer_code,'') NOT IN ('X') AND isnull(jpb_gubn,'') Like concat('%',#{jpb_gubn},'%') and jsayong_gubn <> '4' and jsayong_gubn in ('1','2') AND LEN(jcustomer_code) > 0 Group by jcustomer_code, jcustomer_code_seq, jpb_gubn ORDER BY CONVERT(int, jcustomer_code_seq)
select jcustomer_code as jcustomer_code from JCODE3 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE jsayong_gubn <> '4' AND LEN(jcustomer_code) > 0 Group by jcustomer_code ORDER BY jcustomer_code

select jcustomer_code, jmodel_code from JCODE3 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE isnull(jcustomer_code,'') = #{jcustomer_code} and jsayong_gubn <> '4' AND LEN(jcustomer_code) > 0 Group by jcustomer_code, jmodel_code ORDER BY jcustomer_code, jmodel_code

select jkey, jpum , jgugek , jsize, jmodel_code, jcolor_code, jcustomer_code, convert(integer, DBO.DF_TB_PCODE_JQTY(jkey, #{frdate}, #{todate}) ) as jqty from JCODE3 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE isnull(jkey,'') Like concat('%',#{jpum},'%') and jsayong_gubn <> '4' and isnull(jpb_gubn,'') Like concat('%',#{jpb_gubn},'%') ORDER BY jkey, jpum

select jkey, jpb_gubn, jgong_code, jdan_code, jmodel_code, jcolor_code, jcustomer_code, jbonsa_code, jsayong_gubn, jpum, jgugek, jsize, convert(int , jchgoga0) as jchgoga0, jbigo, convert(integer, DBO.DF_TB_PCODE_JQTY(jkey, #{frdate}, #{todate}) ) as jqty from JCODE3 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE isnull(jmodel_code,'') = #{jmodel_code} and isnull(jcustomer_code,'') = #{jcustomer_code} and jsayong_gubn <> '4' ORDER BY jmodel_code, CONVERT(float, jcolor_code3),jkey

select jkey, jpb_gubn, jgong_code, jdan_code, jmodel_code, jcolor_code, jcustomer_code, jcustomer_code_seq, jbonsa_code, jbonsa_code2, jbonsa_code_seq, jbonsa_code_seq2, jmodel_code2, jcolor_code2, delflag, jcolor_code3, isnull(jopt,'') as jopt, jsayong_gubn, jpum, jgugek, jsize, convert ( numeric , convert(int , jchgoga0) ) AS jchgoga0, jbigo, E.jcifcodename as jcifcodename from JCODE3 WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN jcifcode E WITH(NOLOCK) ON (JCODE3.jmodel_code = E.jcifcode) WHERE (isnull(jpum,'') Like concat('%',#{jpum},'%') or isnull(jkey,'') Like concat('%',#{jpum},'%')) and jsayong_gubn <> '4' and isnull(delflag,'0') = '0' ORDER BY jkey

select jkey, jpb_gubn, jgong_code, jdan_code, jmodel_code, jcolor_code, jcustomer_code, jcustomer_code_seq, jbonsa_code, jbonsa_code2, jbonsa_code_seq, jbonsa_code_seq2, jmodel_code2, jcolor_code2, delflag, jcolor_code3, jopt, jsayong_gubn, jpum, jgugek, jsize, convert ( numeric , convert(int , jchgoga0) ) AS jchgoga0, jbigo, E.jcifcodename as jcifcodename from JCODE3 WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN jcifcode E WITH(NOLOCK) ON (JCODE3.jmodel_code = E.jcifcode) WHERE (isnull(jpum,'') Like concat('%',#{jpum},'%') or isnull(jkey,'') Like concat('%',#{jpum},'%') ) and isnull(jpb_gubn,'') Like concat('%',#{jpb_gubn},'%') and isnull(jmodel_code,'') Like concat('%',#{jmodel_code},'%') and jsayong_gubn <> '4' and isnull(delflag,'0') = '0' ORDER BY jpum
mapper.insert: insert into JCODE3 ( jkey, jpb_gubn, jgong_code, jdan_code, jmodel_code, jmodel_code2, jcolor_code, jcolor_code2, jcolor_code3, jcustomer_code, jcustomer_code_seq, jbonsa_code, jbonsa_code2, jbonsa_code_seq, jbonsa_code_seq2, jsayong_gubn, jpum, jgugek, jsize, jchgoga0, jbigo, delflag) values (#{jkey}, #{jpb_gubn}, #{jgong_code}, #{jdan_code}, #{jmodel_code}, #{jmodel_code2}, #{jcolor_code}, #{jcolor_code2}, #{jcolor_code3}, #{jcustomer_code}, #{jcustomer_code_seq}, #{jbonsa_code}, #{jbonsa_code2}, #{jbonsa_code_seq}, #{jbonsa_code_seq2}, #{jsayong_gubn}, #{jpum}, #{jgugek}, #{jsize}, #{jchgoga0}, #{jbigo}, '0')
mapper.update: UPDATE JCODE3 SET delflag = '1' where jkey = #{jkey}
mapper.select: SELECT jbonsa_code, jbonsa_code2, jmodel_code2 as jmodel_code, jpb_gubn from JCODE3 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE isnull(jpb_gubn,'') Like concat('%',#{jpb_gubn},'%') AND jsayong_gubn IN ( '1', '2','3') AND isnull(jbonsa_code,'') = #{jbonsa_code} and jsayong_gubn <> '4' GROUP BY jbonsa_code, jbonsa_code_seq, jbonsa_code2, jbonsa_code_seq2, jmodel_code2, jpb_gubn ORDER BY CONVERT(int, jbonsa_code_seq), CONVERT(int, jbonsa_code_seq2), jbonsa_code2, jmodel_code2, jpb_gubn

select p.flag, Left(p.jdate,4) + '-' + substring(p.jdate, 5,2)+ '-' + substring(p.jdate, 7,2) as jdate, p.jkey, p.jpum,p.jgugek, p.jbonsa_code, p.jcolor_code, p.jmodel_code, p.ipsu, p.chulsu FROM ( select '0' as flag, A.key1 as jdate, B.jkey, B.jpum, isnull(B.jgugek, '') as jgugek, B.jbonsa_code, B.jcolor_code, B.jmodel_code, a.ijaego_su1 as ipsu, 0 as chulsu from jego_jepmjanak A WITH (NOLOCK), jcode3 B WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.jepm = B.jkey and A.key1 between #{frdate} and #{todate} and isnull(B.jkey,'') Like concat('%',#{jkey},'%') and isnull(B.jpb_gubn,'') Like concat('%',#{jpb_gubn},'%') and a.ijaego_su1 <> 0
union all
Select '1' as flag, A.misdate as jdate, B.jkey, B.jpum, isnull(B.jgugek, '') as jgugek, B.jbonsa_code, B.jcolor_code, B.jmodel_code, 0 as ipsu, A.qty as chulsu from tb_da024 A WITH (NOLOCK), jcode3 B WITH (NOLOCK) , TB_DA023 C WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.pcode = B.jkey and A.misdate = C.misdate and A.misnum = C.misnum AND isnull(C.makflag, '0') = '1' and isnull(A.fixflag, '0') = '1' and A.misdate between #{frdate} and #{todate} and isnull(B.jkey,'') Like concat('%',#{jkey},'%') and isnull(B.jpb_gubn,'') Like concat('%',#{jpb_gubn},'%') and A.qty <> 0 ) P ORDER BY P.jdate, p.jkey, p.flag
